org.apache.hadoop.hbase

Class HBaseClusterManager.CommandProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseClusterManager.CommandProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HBaseClusterManager.HadoopShellCommandProvider, HBaseClusterManager.HBaseShellCommandProvider, HBaseClusterManager.ZookeeperShellCommandProvider
    Enclosing class:
    HBaseClusterManager

    abstract static class HBaseClusterManager.CommandProvider
extends Object
    Provides command strings for services to be executed by Shell. CommandProviders are pluggable, and different deployments(windows, bigtop, etc) can be managed by plugging-in custom CommandProvider's or ClusterManager's.
